item.title: Several Things for Writing Statistical Paper
item.description: 1. Keep tex source file clean and tidy. Make everything easy to read and compare. No extra spacing or indention, and two blank lines for separating paragraph. Make line width under 80. While do not limit math expression to 80. Break math expression at right places. 2. Make notations, equations precise and concise, and explain clearly meaning of each notation. Do not use abbreviation if unnecessary. The notations should be consistent through the paper.
